contentrichtext.text: '''Eric Wilson''' may refer to: *[[Eric Wilson (bassist)]] (born 1970), member of Sublime *[[Eric Charles Twelves Wilson]] (1912–2008), recipient of the Victoria Cross *[[Eric Wilson (suspense writer)]], American author *[[Eric Wilson (athlete)]] (1900–1985), American athlete *[[Eric Wilson (journalist)]], American journalist for the [[New York Times]] *[[Eric Wilson (author)]] (born 1940), Canadian author *[[Eric Wilson (American football)]] (born 1962), former football player for the Buffalo Bills and Washington Redskins *[[Eric Wilson (Canadian football)]] (born 1978), defensive tackle for the Montreal Alouettes *Eric Wilson, murdered Canadian teenager and subject of the documentary ''[[Just Another Missing Kid]]'' *Eric C. Wilson, one of the [[Norfolk Four]], a group of men who are believed to be wrongfully convicted in a rape/murder in Norfolk, Virginia {{hndis|Wilson, Eric}}
